meanings.definition: Having an attractive or pleasing shape
meanings.sent1: The dancer had a shapely figure that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She admired the shapely curves of the vase on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The shapely clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her shapely handwriting flowed elegantly across the page.
meanings.sent5: The shapely silhouette of the mountain against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: In a way that is well-proportioned and pleasing to the eye
meanings.sent1: She moved gracefully and shapely on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The tree branches swayed shapely in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out shapely in the sunbeam, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed shapely through the valley, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed shapely in the garden, adding color to the landscape.
